data.chText: 危险；风险
data.enText: the possibility of sth bad happening at some time in the future; a situation that could be dangerous or have a bad result

data.chText: 吸烟会增加得心脏病的危险。
data.enText: Smoking can increase the risk of developing heart disease.

data.chText: 应该告诉病人这种治疗所涉及的风险。
data.enText: Patients should be made aware of the risks involved with this treatment.

data.chText: 整桩买卖化为泡影的风险仍然存在。
data.enText: There is still a risk that the whole deal will fall through.

data.chText: 这些化学药品对人类健康没有什么危害。
data.enText: The chemicals pose little risk (= are not dangerous) to human health.

data.chText: 值得承担的风险
data.enText: a calculated risk (= one that you think is small compared with the possible benefits)

data.chText: 任何商业投资都包含一定的风险因素。
data.enText: Any business venture contains an element of risk .

data.chText: 我们也许可以将这些资料托付给她，但实在不值得去担这样的风险。
data.enText: We could probably trust her with the information but it's just not worth the risk .

data.chText: 危险人物；会带来风险的事物
data.enText: a person or thing that is likely to cause problems or danger at some time in the future

data.chText: 这伙人被认为是威胁国家安全的危险分子。
data.enText: The group was considered to be a risk to national security.

data.chText: 健康 / 火灾的一大隐患
data.enText: a major health/fire risk

data.chText: （风险很小或很大的）借款人，保险对象
data.enText: a person or business that a bank or an insurance company is willing/unwilling to lend money or sell insurance to because they are likely/unlikely to pay back the money etc.

data.chText: 由于已有了五次索赔要求，他现在是一位风险很大的被保险人。
data.enText: With five previous claims, he's now a bad insurance risk.
at risk (from/of sth)

data.chText: 有危险；冒风险
data.enText: in danger of sth unpleasant or harmful happening

data.chText: 所有的疾病都是如此，一些人比另一些人更容易受到威胁。
data.enText: As with all diseases, certain groups will be more at risk than others.

data.chText: 如果我们发动战争，无辜的生命就会受到威胁。
data.enText: If we go to war, innocent lives will be put at risk .
at the risk of doing sth

data.chText: （用以引出可能听上去愚蠢或冒犯人的话）冒着…的风险
data.enText: used to introduce sth that may sound stupid or may offend sb

data.chText: 也许我难免显得无知，可互联网到底是怎么运行的呢？
data.enText: At the risk of showing my ignorance, how exactly does the Internet work?
at risk to yourself/sb/sth

data.chText: 冒伤及…的危险
data.enText: with the possibility of harming yourself/sb/sth

data.chText: 他冒着相当大的生命危险跳到水里去救那只狗。
data.enText: He dived in to save the dog at considerable risk to his own life.
do sth at your own risk

data.chText: 自担风险；责任自负
data.enText: to do sth even though you have been warned about the possible dangers and will have to take responsibility for anything bad that happens

data.chText: 游泳者越过此界限后果自负。
data.enText: Persons swimming beyond this point do so at their own risk (= on a notice) .

data.chText: 贵重物品需看管，否则风险自负。
data.enText: Valuables are left at their owner's risk (= on a notice) .
run a risk (of sth/of doing sth)

data.chText: 冒风险；有…的危险
data.enText: to be in a situation in which sth bad could happen to you

data.chText: 超重的人有犯心脏病和中风的危险。
data.enText: People who are overweight run a risk of a heart attack or stroke.
run the risk (of sth/ of doing sth)
run risks

data.chText: 冒…的危险；冒险（做某事）
data.enText: to be or put yourself in a situation in which sth bad could happen to you

data.chText: 我们不想冒险失去他们的生意。
data.enText: We don't want to run the risk of losing their business.

data.chText: 投资就是要冒风险。
data.enText: Investment is all about running risks.
take a risk
take risks

data.chText: 冒险（做某事）
data.enText: to do sth even though you know that sth bad could happen as a result

data.chText: 我不愿意去冒这个险。
data.enText: That's a risk I'm not prepared to take.

data.chText: 你没有权利拿别人的生命去冒险。
data.enText: You have no right to take risks with other people's lives.

data.chText: 使…冒风险（或面临危险）
data.enText: to put sth valuable or important in a dangerous situation, in which it could be lost or damaged

data.chText: 他冒着生命危险去救她。
data.enText: He risked his life to save her.

data.chText: 她在使自己和子女的健康遭受威胁。
data.enText: She was risking her own and her children's health.

data.chText: 他冒险把自己所有的钱都押在了一场纸牌游戏上。
data.enText: He risked all his money on a game of cards.

data.chText: 冒…的风险（或危险）
data.enText: to do sth that may mean that you get into a situation which is unpleasant for you

data.chText: 他们别无选择。如果待在那儿，就面临死亡。
data.enText: There was no choice. If they stayed there, they risked death.

data.chText: 他们知道自己冒着被捕的危险。
data.enText: They knew they risked being arrested.

data.chText: 冒险做；（明知结果而）大胆做
data.enText: to do sth that you know is not really a good idea or may not succeed

data.chText: 他壮着胆子瞅了瞅她那张愤怒的脸。
data.enText: He risked a glance at her furious face.

data.chText: 这件事决心难下，但我们决定冒险一试。
data.enText: It was a difficult decision but we decided to risk it .

data.chText: 我们受到忠告，在这种条件下不要冒险出行。
data.enText: We've been advised not to risk travelling in these conditions.
risk life and limb
risk your neck

data.chText: 冒死；不惜受伤
data.enText: to risk being killed or injured in order to do sth

means: (风险很小或很大的)借款人，保险对象

ex.chText: 他还是小孩子的时候，从不敢在晚上外出。
ex.enText: He never ventured out at night when he was a child.

ex.chText: 有人在敲门，她犹豫了一下，然后大着胆子下楼，走向门口。
ex.enText: Someone was knocking, and she paused before venturing downstairs to the door.
It's very bold of you to venture to do so.

synonyms.bx: 指冒风险试一试，或是去可能会有危险的地方，或是做有风险的事。

ex.chText: 那个逃跑的奴隶决定留在山洞里，因为他不敢冒险被人发现。
ex.enText: The runaway slave decided to stay in the cave because he couldn't chance being found.

ex.chText: 他不知道另一条路线是不是能节省更多的时间，但是他决定冒一下险。
ex.enText: He was not sure if another route could save him more time, but he decided to chance it.

synonyms.bx: 指做自己觉得可能有风险的事情。

ex.chText: 粗心大意的驾驶者拿乘客和自己的生命冒险。
ex.enText: Careless drivers hazard passengers' lives as well as their own.
I wouldn't like to hazard a guess.

synonyms.bx: 指为获得某物而冒失去钱财等的风险，也指冒险猜测、建议等。

ex.chText: 难道你不认为吸烟者其实是在拿自己的健康去冒险吗？
ex.enText: Don't you think that smokers are actually risking their own health?

ex.chText: 那名政客准备不惜一切来避免离婚。
ex.enText: That politician has prepared to risk everything to avoid divorce.

ex.chText: 如果不能得到那笔贷款，他们就有可能失去公司。
ex.enText: If they cannot get that loan, they may risk losing the company.

ex.chText: 你可以编个迟到的理由，但我不想冒这个险。
ex.enText: You could make up a reason for being late, but I wouldn't risk it.

synonyms.bx: 指使遭受失去、毁坏、伤害等风险或承担此类风险去做某事，也指做有危险或不好结果的事。

d: 使…冒风险；冒…的风险；冒险做

data.enText: at risk (from/of sth)

data.chText: 有危险；冒风险
data.enText: in danger of sth unpleasant or harmful happening

data.chText: 所有的疾病都是如此，一些人比另一些人更容易受到威胁。
data.enText: As with all diseases, certain groups will be more at risk than others.

data.chText: 如果我们发动战争，无辜的生命就会受到威胁。
data.enText: If we go to war, innocent lives will be put at risk .
at the risk of doing sth

data.chText: （用以引出可能听上去愚蠢或冒犯人的话）冒着…的风险
data.enText: used to introduce sth that may sound stupid or may offend sb

data.chText: 也许我难免显得无知，可互联网到底是怎么运行的呢？
data.enText: At the risk of showing my ignorance, how exactly does the Internet work?
at risk to yourself/sb/sth

data.chText: 冒伤及…的危险
data.enText: with the possibility of harming yourself/sb/sth

data.chText: 他冒着相当大的生命危险跳到水里去救那只狗。
data.enText: He dived in to save the dog at considerable risk to his own life.
do sth at your own risk

data.enText: to do sth even though you have been warned about the possible dangers and will have to take responsibility for anything bad that happens

data.chText: 游泳者越过此界限后果自负。
data.enText: Persons swimming beyond this point do so at their own risk (= on a notice) .

data.chText: 贵重物品需看管，否则风险自负。
data.enText: Valuables are left at their owner's risk (= on a notice) .
run a risk (of sth/of doing sth)

data.chText: 冒风险；有…的危险
data.enText: to be in a situation in which sth bad could happen to you

data.chText: 超重的人有犯心脏病和中风的危险。
data.enText: People who are overweight run a risk of a heart attack or stroke.
run the risk (of sth/ of doing sth)
run risks

data.chText: 冒…的危险；冒险（做某事）
data.enText: to be or put yourself in a situation in which sth bad could happen to you

data.chText: 我们不想冒险失去他们的生意。
data.enText: We don't want to run the risk of losing their business.

data.chText: 投资就是要冒风险。
data.enText: Investment is all about running risks.
take a risk
take risks

data.chText: 冒险（做某事）
data.enText: to do sth even though you know that sth bad could happen as a result

data.chText: 我不愿意去冒这个险。
data.enText: That's a risk I'm not prepared to take.

data.chText: 你没有权利拿别人的生命去冒险。
data.enText: You have no right to take risks with other people's lives.
risk life and limb
risk your neck

data.chText: 冒死；不惜受伤
data.enText: to risk being killed or injured in order to do sth

tr: a venture undertaken without regard to possible loss or injury
example: he saw the rewards but not the risks of crime
there was a danger he would do the wrong thing

tr: the probability of being exposed to an infectious agent
the probability of becoming infected given that exposure to an infectious agent has occurred
a possibility of incurring loss or misfortune
example: drinking alcohol is a health hazard

tr: take a risk in the hope of a favorable outcome
example: When you buy these stocks you are gambling

tr: expose to a chance of loss or damage
example: We risked losing a lot of money in this venture
She laid her job on the line when she told the boss that he was wrong

value.def: If there is a risk of something unpleasant, there is a possibility that it will happen.

example.ex: There is a small risk of brain damage from the procedure...
example.tran: 该手术有导致脑损伤的轻微风险。

example.ex: In all the confusion, there's a serious risk that the main issues will be forgotten.
example.tran: 在一片混乱中，主要的问题很有可能会被遗忘。

example.ex: ...mentally disordered women who pose a serious risk to the public...
example.tran: 给民众构成严重威胁的精神错乱的女人

example.ex: I suppose people do it because there is that element of danger and risk...
example.tran: 我想人们这样做是因为其中存在危险和风险的因素。

example.ex: Obesity is a major risk factor in many diseases.
example.tran: 肥胖是引发多种疾病的重要因素。

value.def: If something that you do is a risk, it might have unpleasant or undesirable results.

example.ex: You're taking a big risk showing this to Kravis...
example.tran: 你把这个给克拉维斯看会有很大的风险。

example.ex: This was one risk that paid off.
example.tran: 这是一个成功的冒险。

value.def: If you say that something or someone is a risk, you mean they are likely to cause harm.

example.ex: It's being overfat that constitutes a health risk...
example.tran: 威胁健康的一个因素是身体过于肥胖。

example.ex: The restaurant has been refurbished — it was found to be a fire risk...
example.tran: 这家餐馆已经重新整修了——之前发现存在火灾隐患。

example.ex: He was not seen as a risk to national security.
example.tran: 人们不认为他是威胁国家安全的危险分子。

value.tran: 冒险行为;威胁;隐患;危险的人

value.def: If you are considered a good risk, a bank or shop thinks that it is safe to lend you money or let you have goods without paying for them at the time.

example.ex: Before providing the cash, they will have to decide whether you are a good or bad risk...
example.tran: 在提供资金之前，他们得确认你是不是信誉良好的贷款对象。

example.ex: If you are already considered a credit risk by a bank, a secured loan might be your only alternative.
example.tran: 如果银行已经认为你有信用风险，那么抵押贷款就是你唯一的选择了。

value.def: If you risk something unpleasant, you do something which might result in that thing happening or affecting you.

example.ex: Those who fail to register risk severe penalties...
example.tran: 那些没有注册的人可能会受到严厉的处罚。

example.ex: Pregnant women who are heavy drinkers risk damaging the unborn foetus.
example.tran: 酗酒的孕妇可能会给体内的胎儿造成伤害。

value.tran: 冒着…的危险;担着…的风险

value.def: If you risk doing something, you do it, even though you know that it might have undesirable consequences.

example.ex: The captain was not willing to risk taking his ship through the straits in such bad weather.
example.tran: 船长不愿意在这样恶劣的天气里冒险将船驶过海峡。

example.ex: At the top, I risked a glance back...
example.tran: 在顶端，我壮着胆回头瞟了一眼。

example.ex: Don't risk it. It isn't worth it.
example.tran: 不要冒这个险。这样做不值得。

value.def: If you risk your life or something else important, you behave in a way that might result in it being lost or harmed.

example.ex: She risked her own life to help a disabled woman...
example.tran: 她冒着生命危险去帮助一个残疾妇女。

example.ex: Why should he have risked all that to become an agent of a foreign power?
example.tran: 为什么就该他冒失去这一切的风险做外国势力的代理人呢？

value.tran: 冒着（失去生命等）的危险

value.def: To be at risk means to be in a situation where something unpleasant might happen.

example.ex: Up to 25,000 jobs are still at risk...
example.tran: 多达25,000份工作仍受到威胁。

example.ex: An estimated seven million people are at risk of starvation...
example.tran: 估计有700万人面临着饿死的危险。

example.ex: If they have the virus they are putting patients at risk.
example.tran: 如果他们有这种病毒，就会将病人置于危险境地。

value.tran: 处境危险;有风险的;在危险中

value.def: If you do something at the risk of something unpleasant happening, you do it even though you know that the unpleasant thing might happen as a result.

example.ex: At the risk of being repetitive, I will say again that statistics are only a guide...
example.tran: 尽管会显得啰唆，但我还得再说一遍，统计数字只是一个参考。

example.ex: Americans wanted to aid Britain even at the risk of war.
example.tran: 哪怕冒着开战的危险，美国人也想帮助英国人。

value.def: If you tell someone that they are doing something at their own risk, you are warning them that, if they are harmed, it will be their own responsibility.

example.ex: Those who wish to come here will do so at their own risk.
example.tran: 那些想来这里的人风险自负。

value.tran: 自担风险;责任自负;后果自负

value.def: If you run the risk of doing or experiencing something undesirable, you do something knowing that the undesirable thing might happen as a result.

example.ex: The officers had run the risk of being dismissed...
example.tran: 这些警官冒了被开除的风险。

example.ex: I knew I was running a great many risks.
example.tran: 我知道我正担着很多的风险。

trans: 处境危险;有风险的;在危险中
风险管理
风险评估；风险评价；危险度评价；風險評估；危险性评估
高风险；高危；高度危险；高危险；危险
信贷（用）风险
风险分析；风险分析方法；危险性分析；風險分析；风险因素分析
财务风险
危险分子(尤指危及国家、机构等安全的)
风险因素；风险系数
无风险；无危险；没有风险；不是无风险；没有危险
冒着…危险;担着…的风险
市场风险
風險評估；风险评价；风险衡量；风险评估；风险评定
投资风险
冒险；万难
风险投资；風險投資；冒险投资
操作风险；经营风险；运营风险；营运风险；作业风险
风险厌恶；风险规避；风险规避者；规避风险；风险反感
自负风险，自负责任
火险
